entry.content:
We are looking to hire a PhD student to work on interactive information retrieval, user modelling and human-computer interaction! Ideal starting date is Summer/Autumn 2019. We have yet to send out an official advertisement, but if you are interested, please send an up-to-date CV together with a description of your research interests to Dorota.

UPDATE: the official advert is now available online here.
